name: tProof
introduce: tProof is a dApp that generates decentralized timestamp proofs so that anyone can prove that a document existed before a given date. Users can mint two tProof proofs, Hash-only for those who just want to publish file hashes on-chain, Hash-with-file uploads the original file to Arweave permaweb and appends the public URL of the file to the minted tProof via Chainlink Oralces.
